explains: adv. 道歉地，认错地；辩解地

sentences.en: 'I'm sorry I'm late,' he murmured apologetically.
sentences.cn: “对不起，我迟到了。”他小声道歉说。

sentences.en: "It's of no great literary merit," he said, almost apologetically.
sentences.cn: “它不具有重要的文学价值，”他几乎抱歉地说道。

sentences.en: "I can't come," she said apologetically, "I have forgotten how to fly."
sentences.cn: “我来不了，”她抱歉地说，“我忘了怎么飞了。”
